Title: Charles-Hubert Paris Open Face Mechanical Pocket Watch

Roman numerals. 17 jewel mechanical movement. Has a see through back displaying the mechanicalmovement. Comes with deluxe gift box. 1.61 in. Dia. A contemporary watch with a classic feel, the Charles-Hubert, Paris Open Face Mechanical Pocket Watch 3673 pairs a skeletonized display with crisp silver tones and the traditional appeal of 17-jewel mechanical movement. Luminous hands and silver-tone Roman numeral hour markers make for easy time-reading, while a see-through window on the back cover draws the eye and imparts a modern touch. Complete with a matching curb chain, this Charles- Hubert original arrives in a deluxe blue giftbox. See all Product description Handling We will ship all orders within 2 business days of payment.
